thread.title: Pelosi Hard-Pressed To Name Leader of Democratic Party
thread.title_full: Pelosi Hard-Pressed To Name Leader of Democratic Party

author: Jack Davis
title: Pelosi Hard-Pressed To Name Leader of Democratic Party
text:
Pelosi Hard-Pressed To Name Leader of Democratic Party "... but we have a plan ..." by Jack Davis March 23, 2017 at 11:20am Share on Facebook Share Tweet Email Email Print   
Although former Secretary of Labor Tom Perez is the chairman of the Democratic National Committee, his name was not among those that came to mind when House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi , D-Calif., was asked to name the leader of her party. 
“Who is the leader of the Democratic Party?” Anderson Cooper asked Pelosi Tuesday during an interview on CNN. 
“Well, President Obama was the president of the United States until just a matter of weeks ago. I don’t think that he can be dismissed as the leader of the Democratic Party,” she said.
